entry.title: Goals? Julia Piorek, 10, knows all about them 😍 Julia started mountain biking at age 8, inspired by her father Greg and brother Filip, in the Ballyhouras. The network of trails is perfect for beginners, with so much variety for progression. Already compet

entry.title: Oisín O'Callaghan approves of Ballyhoura's new trails!⚡ "We now have a good variety of blues, reds, blacks; it's going to be a big improvement for all the youngsters coming up—and for me, training, upping my skill levels.”—Oisín O'Callaghan ⚠️ Please note

entry.title: Lough Gur is magical at any time of the day ✨ Come and enjoy breathtaking views of the lake, and don't miss Lough Gur's Easter Craft Fair next Saturday, with a variety of handmade goods from a diverse range of stalls. 📍Lough Gur Lakeshore Park 📅 Sat 30th
